description:
A great-looking, versatile T-shirt. The perforated fabric breathes like a champ and flat seams don't intrude into your consciousness while you're running, doing yoga or circuit training.

  • Micro-perforated fabric is moisture-wicking, quick-drying and highly breathable
  • Flatlock seams are comfortable against your skin
  • Front chest pocket
name: Vuori Tradewind Performance Shirt - Men's
